Northern Arizona Leadership Alliance (NALA) was originally formed in 2004 as Flagstaff Forty by a small group of committed Flagstaff-area business leaders as a mechanism for discussing, studying, and, where appropriate, addressing critical needs of our community and state. Its mission is to improve Northern Arizona and the state of Arizona by bringing together talent, resources and leadership to create action on priority issues. Three main areas of focus are Education, Economy and the Environment. For issues of statewide importance, NALA works closely with our sister organizations, Greater Phoenix Leadership and the Southern Arizona Leadership Council.
Northern Arizona Center for Entrepreneurship and Technology
Flagstaff Tech Track (FTT) is a business-led collaboration of digital product companies and professionals in the greater Flagstaff region.

Math is the foundation, framework, and catalyst behind every interactive digital dream you can imagine, it’s a beautiful thing.  Introducing Made With Math. We design and build mobile interfaces that people love to use.   Made With Math is a digital studio made of thinkers, creatives and architects who love building mobile apps. We specialize in application user experience (UX), user interface design (UI), architecture strategy, development, and testing.Did you know that designing a good user experience (UX) utilizes the same skill set as being a good storyteller? We take users on a digital journey that feels intuitive but will also delights with well-timed surprises. Even if you avoid math, we think you’ll love working with us. If you have an idea for a mobile app, give me a call-- 818-399-8066.

June 25, 2011, Daniel worked with Scott in different groups

Scott has consistently done an amazing job of developing new clients and finding opportunities for new projects with existing clients.  Even when customers and projects were drying up for other companies during tough economic times, Scott always had new deals and creative projects coming through the pipeline for us.  I've worked with Scott for over two years, and as someone on the technical side of the operation, I've always been impressed by how Scott keeps up to date with the latest trends and products,  takes the time to really understand the details of how a complex project will work, and how well he communicates with both technical and business contacts, inside and outside of our company.  Lastly, I have noticed how much our customers trust and depend on Scott to help them implement solutions as quickly and painlessly as possible. I think that their continued loyalty is a testament to Scott's care and hard work in maintaining great relationships with our clients and routinely exceeding their expectations in delivering great service and results.

I've worked with Scott and several of his clients.  His greatest strength is connecting with his clients on a personable, friendly level.  They trust him.
